49178.「どうやら 女神の黄玉石は\n 無事 光の河に捧げられたようです。:
The Yellow Goddess Gem was safely offered to
the River of Light.

49183.<center>大いなる災い……\nその存在によって 魔瘴が\nアストルティアに:
The great calamity...
Its very existence has brought the
demonic miasma to Astoltia.

49184.<center>……そして 今は\n数百年ごとに訪れる 魔瘴の荒ぶりし時。:
...Every several hundred years, the miasma
erupts from below...and it has come yet again.

49185.<center>この機に乗じ 魔族どもは\n大いなる災厄を呼びよせんと 暗躍を始:
The demonsーwho take advantage of this
chaosーmake their move. Their goal is to
bring forth a great evil.

49186.<center>存続か 滅亡か……。\nアストルティアは 試練の時を迎えた。:
Survival...or extinction?
The time of Astoltia's trial is nigh.
